comments:
Abolished 1.4.1938 and added to the parish of Ackton & Snydale. 
    See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).
Created 1.4.1938 out of the parishes of Snydale and Ackton.

Abolished 26.3.1891 and added to the parish of Byram cum 
    Sutton.

Created 26.3.1891 from the separate parishes of Byram cum Poole 
    and Sutton. See also Table 2, note (p).

Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Pontefract. 
    See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).

Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the Wakefield unparished area. See also Table 
    2, notes (d), (e) and (n).

Abolished 1.4.1938 and divided between the parishes of Castleford 
    and Fairburn. See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).

Abolished 1.4.1938 and added to the parish of Castleford. 
    See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).

Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the Wakefield unparished 
    area.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Rothwell 
    and Castleford. See also Table 2, notes (d), (e) and (m).
Abolished 26.3.1892 and added to the parish of Pontefract.

Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the Wakefield unparished 
    area.

Abolished 1.4.1920 and added to the parish of Pontefract. 
    See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).

Abolished 1.4.1938 and added to the parish of Featherstone. 
    See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).

Abolished 1.4.1938 and divided between the parishes of Ackton & 
    Snydale and Huntwick with Foulby & Nostell. See also Table 2, notes (c), (i) 
    and (k).

Abolished 26.3.1891 and added to the parish of Byram cum 
    Sutton. See also Table 2, notes (d) and (e).
Abolished 1.4.1920 and added to the parish of Pontefract.

Abolished 1.4.1937 and divided between the parishes of Castleford 
    and Rothwell. See also Table 2, notes (d), (e) and (m).
